translations: adj.抑抑扬格的；短短长格的

sentences.sentence: Dr. Diamond found another effect of the anapestic beat.
sentences.translation: Turner Overdrive，The Band和Diamond医生还发现摇滚音乐节奏（anapestic beat）的另一个效应。

sentences.sentence: Because of its jog-trot rhythm, pure anapestic metre was originally used only in light or popular English verse, but after the 18th century it appeared in serious poetry.
sentences.translation: 因为，仄仄平节奏缓慢，纯仄仄平音步原本只用于通俗英语韵文，但是十八世纪后，才出现于严肃诗。
